cards.title: Arctis
powers: You may draw a card. If you don't, then until the end of your next turn, when cold damage would be dealt to or by {Arctis}, you may reduce that damage by 1 and put an icework from your hand into play.
incapacitatedAbilities: Select a target. Reduce the next damage dealt to that target by 2.

openingLines.TheDreamerCharacter: Be careful, everyone, and stay focused!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: You stand for nothing, and that is why you'll fail.

cards.title: Child of the Snow
body: Draw a card.
Search your deck for an icework and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.
You may play a card.
{Arctis} deals himself 1 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: He's been so sick for so long.{BR}I wish you'd seen him. The wonder in{BR}his eyes, snowflakes freezing on his skin.{BR}I've never seen him smile like that...

cards.title: Chill Touch
body: {Arctis} deals 1 target 1 melee and 1 cold damage.
Destroy an ongoing or reduce damage dealt by a target dealt cold damage this way by 2 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Didn't y'all check the forecast? Thunderstorms all day long.
Funny. I heard it'd be too cold.

cards.title: Cold as Ice
body: When {Arctis} is dealt cold damage, he regains 1 hp.
The first time he regains hp this way each turn, you may draw a card or put a card from your hand into play. If you do neither, {Arctis} regains 1 hp.
When this card enters play, {Arctis} deals himself 1 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Kid, you're freezing. Got frostbite{BR}from touching you. How are you alive?

cards.title: Cold Front
body: When cold damage would be dealt to or by {Arctis}, you may reduce that damage by 1 or 2 to put an icework into play from your hand.

flavorQuotes.text: Snowflake melting in{BR} the sun, we are as you always feared,{BR}but can ensure you never lose another.
Feared? I've waited{BR}so long for this.

cards.title: Cryogenic Blood
body: Increase damage dealt by {Arctis} by 1.
At the end of your turn, {Arctis} may deal himself up to 2 cold damage. If he is dealt no damage this way, destroy this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Your theory is correct. The child is{BR}stable at 28 degrees.

cards.title: Crystal Armor
body: When this card is played, destroy it.
When this card enters play, destroy all other copies of this card.
When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.
When {Arctis} would be dealt damage, you may redirect it to this card.

flavorQuotes.text: Stay behind me. Things are{BR}about to get hairy.
Thanks, but I think I'll be alright.

cards.title: Defensive Combat
body: When {Arctis} would be dealt cold damage, you may have an icework regain that much hp instead.
When {Arctis} would be dealt non-cold damage, you may increase that damage by 1 and redirect it to an icework.

flavorQuotes.text: I'll take you beyond the Veil either{BR}way. If you answer my riddle, I'll bring{BR}you back.

cards.title: Freezing Veins
body: Increase cold damage dealt by {Arctis} by 1.
When {Arctis} deals non-cold damage to a target, he then deals that target 1 cold damage. The type of this damage cannot be changed.
At the end of your turn, {Arctis} deals himself 1 cold damage.

flavorQuotes.text: My blood is nearly ice,{BR}but I could never be as cold as you.
Come now, Julian. Is that any{BR}way to speak to your Godfather?

cards.title: Frost Lance
body: When this card is played, destroy it.
When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.

activatableAbilities.name: {ice}
activatableAbilities.text: Discard any number of cards. {Arctis} deals 1 target X plus 2 melee damage, where X = the number of cards discarded this way. Destroy this card.

powers: If you have activated no {iceSmall} effects this turn, activate up to two {iceSmall} effects.

flavorQuotes.text: This is for Geyser, you metal @#$%&!!

cards.title: Frozen Helm
body: When this card is played, destroy it.
When this card enters play, destroy all other copies of this card.
When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.
When {Arctis} would be dealt damage by a target other than {Arctis}, reduce that damage by 1.

flavorQuotes.text: I hate to say I told you so...

cards.title: Glacial Shield
body: When this card is played, destroy it.
When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.

activatableAbilities.name: {ice}
activatableAbilities.text: Until the start of your next turn, when a target other than {Arctis} would deal damage to one of your targets, reduce that damage by 1.

powers: If you have activated no {iceSmall} effects this turn, activate up to two {iceSmall} effects.

flavorQuotes.text: The old roads are{BR}barred to you, mortal!

cards.title: Ice Axe
body: When this card is played, destroy it.
When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.
powers: If you have activated no {iceSmall} effects this turn, activate up to two {iceSmall} effects.

flavorQuotes.text: Finally, a proper foe. I shall grant{BR}thee a quick death, and relay{BR}tales of our battle forever.

cards.title: Icicle Volley
body: When this card is played, destroy it.
When this card is destroyed, draw 2 cards.

activatableAbilities.name: {ice}
activatableAbilities.text: {Arctis} deals up to 3 targets 2 projectile damage each. Destroy this card.

powers: If you have activated no {iceSmall} effects this turn, activate up to two {iceSmall} effects.

flavorQuotes.text: Bear witness now to the end of{BR}the Khaen! The Santaiyin shall{BR}overrun this feeble rock!

cards.flavorReference: Broadcast, Storm of the Century: Primetime

cards.title: Shard Storm
body: You may destroy any number of iceworks.
{Arctis} deals 1 target X plus 1 projectile damage or X targets 2 projectile damage each, where X = the number of cards destroyed this way.

flavorQuotes.text: You can't beat him, run!
I'm not leaving you behind!

cards.flavorReference: The Madness of Dr. Voigt one-shot

cards.title: Sublime Cascade
body: Once per turn, when {Arctis} is dealt cold damage, you may put a card from your hand into play for each point of damage {Arctis} is dealt this way.

flavorQuotes.text: What sorcery is this?!

cards.title: Winter's Wrath
body: When an icework would be dealt damage that would reduce its hp below 1, destroy it instead.
When an icework is destroyed, {Arctis} deals 1 target X cold damage, where X = that card's hp before it was destroyed.

flavorQuotes.text: Hey, Zeno! Catch!
